grith.jgrith.control
Class UserProperty

java.lang.Object
  grith.jgrith.control.UserProperty

public class UserProperty
extends Object

This class manages the properties file which is located in the .globus directory. It enables getting and setting of properties. If a property is not set, it returns "no".

Author:
Markus Binsteiner

Method Detail

addToList

public static boolean addToList(String key,
                                String value)
Appends a value to the end of the list of values for that key (separated by ",", so "," are not allowed

Parameters:
key - the key to which the value is added
value - the value to add
Returns:
true if everything went fine, false if the value already exists

getProperty

public static String getProperty(String key)
Get the property for the specified key.

Parameters:
key - the key
Returns:
the property, if no property is found, it returns null

getPropertyList

public static String[] getPropertyList(String key)
Get the properties in a list as String array

Parameters:
key - the key
Returns:
the property as a String array or null

getPropFile

public static File getPropFile()
Returns the file in which the properties are stored.

Returns:
the prop_file

isInList

public static boolean isInList(String key,
                               String value)
Checks whether an element is in the according list of the key or not

Parameters:
key - the key
value - the element
Returns:
true if element is in list, false if not

removeFromList

public static boolean removeFromList(String key,
                                     String value)

setProperty

public static void setProperty(String key,
                               String value)
                        throws Exception
Sets the property for the specified key

Parameters:
key - the key
value - the value (use lowercase if possible)
Throws:
Exception - if the property couldn't be stored
